from qutip import *
from matplotlib import pyplot, mpl,cm
from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d import Axes3D
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

Q=Qobj(random.random((6,6)))

num_elem=prod(Q.shape)
xpos,ypos=meshgrid(range(Q.shape[0]),range(Q.shape[1]))
xpos=xpos.T.flatten()-0.5
ypos=ypos.T.flatten()-0.5
zpos = zeros(num_elem)
dx =ones(num_elem)
dy = dx.copy()
dz = Q.full().flatten()

#nrm=mpl.colors.Normalize(0,max(dz)) #<-- normalize colors to max. data
nrm=mpl.colors.Normalize(0,1) #<-- normalize colors to 1
colors=cm.jet(nrm(dz)) #list of colors for each bar

fig = plt.figure()
ax = Axes3D(fig,azim=-40,elev=70)
ax.bar3d(xpos, ypos, zpos, dx, dy, dz, color=colors)
ax.axes.w_xaxis.set_major_locator(IndexLocator(1,-0.5))
ax.axes.w_yaxis.set_major_locator(IndexLocator(1,-0.5))
ax.axes.w_zaxis.set_major_locator(IndexLocator(1,0))
ax.set_zlim3d([0,1.1])

cax,kw=mpl.colorbar.make_axes(ax,shrink=.75,pad=.02)
cb1=mpl.colorbar.ColorbarBase(cax,cmap=cm.jet,norm=nrm)

plt.show()
